body.p: Daniel H. Hughes was born in Springfield, Kentucky, on July 17, 1833 to John Reed and Martha (Nantz) Hughes. He earned his Bachelor of Arts at Central College in Danville in 1852 and then went to work as an attorney with his uncle, Willis G. Hughes. Admitted to the bar in January 1855. Married Wright Parker in December 1855 and had seven children. He lived at 213 West O'Bannon Street Morganfield, KY.
